name: dc1-naples
title: Naples Metropolitan Area Data Package
description:
This is the CLARITY data package for the Naples metropolitan area corresponding to the Demonstrator Case (DC1). 
 Further description to be completed

resources.name: heat-wave-duration_historical_19710101-20001231
resources.title: Maximum number of consecutive days when Tmax > 75th percentile of the Apr-Sep days for the baseline emissions scenario in the 1971-2000 period
resources.description: Maximum number of days per year with a mean air temperature at 2 m above ground above the 75th percentile during summer months (Apr-Sep) for the baseline emissions scenario in the 1971-2000 period
